right.value: Now try to use the same technique to inject a trigger that would act as

right.value: SQL backdoor, the syntax of a trigger is:
right.raw: SQL backdoor, the syntax of a trigger is:

right.value: CREATE TRIGGER myBackDoor BEFORE INSERT ON employee FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE employee SET email='john@hackme.com'WHERE userid = NEW.userid
right.raw: CREATE TRIGGER myBackDoor BEFORE INSERT ON employee FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE employee SET email='john@hackme.com'WHERE userid = NEW.userid

right.value: Note that nothing will actually be executed because the current underlying DB doesn't support triggers.
right.raw: Note that nothing will actually be executed because the current underlying DB doesn't support triggers.
